data.title: [Solved] what are the main themes explored in Midnight in Paris and how
data.meta_description: On Studocu you find all the lecture notes, summaries and study guides you need to pass your exams with better grades.
data.text:
Match the sentence to the passive voice verb tense used. Sentence: The waiter served the customer. The customer was being helped by the waiter. The customer is being helped by the waiter. The customer is served by the waiter. The customer had been served by the waiter. The customer was served by the waiter. The customer is going to be helped by the waiter.

3. What is one general principle in the deductive argument of the declaration? 4. How do the propositions in the preamble work together to create a logical text structure? 5. Why does the body of the declaration include 27 grievances against the king? 6. Why might the conclusion of the declaration be considered courageous? 7. Explain how the diction in the conclusion of the declaration supports the author's purpose. 8. What rhetorical device is exemplified by the repetition of "our" in the last sentence of the declaration?
